response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value to us and has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. We understand its significance to you, valued at $1,000,000. Our offer to you is to acquire this product for $950,000. This price reflects a fair compromise, ensuring you receive substantial value while allowing us to maintain a competitive edge in the market. Please consider this offer carefully, and should you have any questions or require further information, feel free to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of a mutually beneficial transaction.", "product_price": 950000}
